basilMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
basilMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

basilMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
basilMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
basilMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

basilMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
basilMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

basilMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
basilMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !basilMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

basilMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
basilMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !basilMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

basilMod:Counterspell.NAME: Counterspell
basilMod:Counterspell.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to debuff, gain !M! artifact.

basilMod:Retribution.NAME: Retribution
basilMod:Retribution.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy inflicts a debuff, apply 2 constricted to ALL enemies.
